duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide dental hygiene services to patients, including teeth cleaning, examining and assessing oral health, and educating patients on oral hygiene practices.
Take and develop dental x-rays, remove plaque and stains from teeth, and apply fluoride treatments.
Assist the dentist during dental procedures and maintain patient records and treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Associate's Degree in Dental Hygiene (Bachelor's Degree preferred)
Valid state licensure as a Dental Hygienist
